name: Ten of the Best Games
overview: This is a compliation of ten games released in 1988 by Database Software. The games had all previously featured as type-in games in earlier editions of the Acorn User magazine, although by the time of release the name had changed to the Micro User. The games are : 1: Dino - Dinosaur themed Moon Buggy side-scroller. 2: Diamond Quest - version of Boulder Dash. 3: Fruit Machine - a fruit machine simulation. 4: Maltese Cross - play the computer at Maltese Cross dominoes. 5: Othello - version of the classic board game. 6: Witch Hunt - multi-room arcade adventure game. 7: Soccer Manager - football team managment simulation. 8: Hunckie Egg - version of Chuckie Egg 9: Stellar Rescue - version of Lunar Lander 10: Karate Warrior - karate-themed fighitng game
